entries.revived_1_2: The worst part about being cloned is trying to find your bearings again.  It's so bizarre to be revived miles away from where you were struck down.
entries.revived_1_3: Oof... That's the last time I go wandering around Gamma Station.  I ran into some Rak'Quas, and next thing I know I'm on the floor of the Cloning Center.
